bill_title: revise certain provisions concerning installment loan lending.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions concerning installment loan lending. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 54-4-65 be amended to read as follows: 54-4-65. No licensee may renew, rollover, or flip a deferred presentment service transaction more than four times. No A renewal, rollover, or flip may not be allowed unless the maker of the check pays the outstanding fee at the time of the renewal. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
